basics.name: Ben Reilly
basics.label: The Software Person You Are Looking For Maybe
basics.summary: Professional software developer with more than eight years of experience with an analytical data science oriented background. I approach problems with curiosity, careful research, and thoughtful collaboration with colleagues.

work.summary: ReUP is a B2B platform for i502 suppliers and retailers that simplifies the supply chain. - lowering costs and managing multi-supplier, multi-product transactions all on a single platform.
Automated precision reforestation/forestry management with autonomous aerial vehicles.
A personal search engine for all your stuff in Dropbox, GitHub, Evernote, JIRA, O365, etc.
highlights: Design and construction of large scale, distributed ETL/indexing solution
Scaling, modeling, and optimization of search engine (Elasticsearch) and public API
Simplified outage management by combining numberous realtime data sources into one interface
Implemented software for load balancing/demand response in Smartgrid pilot project.

work.summary: A utility cooperative that serves as the primary water provider for much of central Arizona, and an electrical utility for the Phoenix metropolitan area
highlights: Created tool to generate highly accurate 24 hour water quality predictions for better contaminant mitigation
Eliminated haphazard static database with a dynamic tool, improving water hazard visibility for maintenance workers.

volunteer.summary: We ensure immigrants are treated fairly at airports.
highlights: Modest consulting on security and approach.

volunteer.summary: The Web framework for perfectionists with deadlines.
highlights: Prevented possible recursion limit issue in database migration planning (https://github.com/django/django/pull/3169)
Optimized index creation for many-to-many fields (https://code.djangoproject.com/ticket/22125)

volunteer.summary: Django REST framework is a powerful and flexible toolkit for building Web APIs.
highlights: Implemented object level permissions and permission filtering (https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/pull/1093)

volunteer.summary: NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.
Simple python script to upload a CSV file to Google's People Finder

publications.name: garbage.today — an almost non-trivial AWS Lambda image search/host
“I’m outraged! I’m going to write an app about this!”
publications.summary: Don't jump to writing #resistance app - show up and talk to vulnerable/underrepresented people.
